titleStmt.title: A letter from Moscow to the Marquess of Carmarthen relating to the Czar of Muscovy's forwardness in his great Navy, &c. since his return home. Publish'd by His Lordship's permission.
titleStmt.author: Deane, John, shipbuilder.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Tim. Goodwin, at the Queen's-Head against St. Dunstan's church in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: the Queen's-Head against St. Dunstan's church in Fleetstreet
